trans-unit.source: Converts service, contract, and endpoint information into metadata documents.
trans-unit.target: 将服务、协定和终结点信息转换为元数据文档。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> class to transform <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects into metadata represented by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> 类可以将 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> 对象转换为由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> 对象表示的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> is used in a three-step process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> 可分三步操作。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A> method, passing the appropriate parameters.
trans-unit.target: 调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A> 方法，传递相应的参数。

trans-unit.source: Determine whether there are any export errors by checking the base <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过检查基本 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> 属性来确定是否发生导出错误。

trans-unit.source: If there are no errors, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A> to get a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects or get more specific versions of the metadata using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedXmlSchemas%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果无错误，则可使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A> 来获取 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> 对象的集合，或通过使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedXmlSchemas%2A> 属性来获取更多元数据的特定版本。

trans-unit.source: You can support exporting custom WSDL extensions by implementing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> interface and custom policy assertions by implementing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension> interface.
trans-unit.target: 您可通过实现 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> 接口，来支持导出自定义 WSDL 扩展，同时还可通过实现 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension> 接口，来支持导出自定义策略断言。

trans-unit.source: For details, see the documentation for those interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见这些接口的文档。

trans-unit.source: The `WsdlExporter` can only be used to export metadata from `ContractDescription` instances that contain Common Language Runtime (CLR) type information, such as a `ContractDescription` instance created using the `ContractDescription.GetContract` method or created as part of the `ServiceDescription` for a `ServiceHost` instance.
trans-unit.target: `WsdlExporter` 只可用于从包含公共运行库 (CLR) 类型信息的 `ContractDescription` 实例导出元数据，例如通过使用 `ContractDescription` 方法创建的 `ContractDescription.GetContract` 实例，或为 `ServiceDescription` 实例创建的作为其 `ServiceHost` 的一部分 实例。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the `WsdlExporter` to export metadata from `ContractDescription` instances imported from service metadata or constructed without type information.
trans-unit.target: 对于从服务元数据导入的或构建时没有类型信息的`WsdlExporter` 实例，您不能使用 `ContractDescription` 从此类实例导出元数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> method to generate a set of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects from the endpoints in a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects called `myServiceEndpoints`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> 方法，从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> 所调用的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> 对象集合中的终结点生成一组 `myServiceEndpoints` 对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> object.
trans-unit.target: 用以创建 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" /> to generate metadata from.
trans-unit.target: 用以从其生成元数据的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" />。

trans-unit.source: Exports metadata that describes only the contract information from the specified contract description.
trans-unit.target: 导出仅描述指定协定说明中的协定信息的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A> method to export metadata from only one contract.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A> 方法仅可从一个协定导出元数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A> to export only contract information.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了如何调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A> 以仅导出协定信息。

trans-unit.source: The exporter encountered an error.
trans-unit.target: 发生错误的导出程序。

trans-unit.source: The contract is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 协定为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> about which to return metadata.
trans-unit.target: 要返回其元数据的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />。

trans-unit.source: Generates metadata about the specified endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 生成有关指定终结点的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> method to create metadata about a single endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> 方法可创建单个终结点的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to export a single endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了如何导出单个终结点。

trans-unit.source: The exporter encountered an error.
trans-unit.target: 发生错误的导出程序。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="endpoint" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="endpoint" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The binding is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 绑定为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> objects about which to generate metadata.
trans-unit.target: 要生成其元数据的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服务的名称。

trans-unit.source: Generates metadata about a group of endpoints from a specified service.
trans-unit.target: 从指定服务生成终结点组的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A> method to create metadata about a set of endpoints from a specified service.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A> 方法可从指定的服务中创建一组终结点的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The exporter encountered an error.
trans-unit.target: 发生错误的导出程序。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="wsdlServiceQName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="wsdlServiceQName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A binding is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 绑定为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> objects after calling one of the export methods.
trans-unit.target: 调用一个导出方法后，获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A> property returns documents only as a result of calls to either <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A> 属性所返回的文档仅可作为调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A> 的结果。

trans-unit.source: Gets a set of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> objects after calling one of the export methods.
trans-unit.target: 调用一个导出方法后，获取一组 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A set of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一组 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedXmlSchemas%2A> property returns documents only as a result of calls to either <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedXmlSchemas%2A> 属性所返回的文档仅可作为调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A> 的结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of generated <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 返回所生成的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> 对象的可枚举集合。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of generated <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> objects that represents the metadata generated as a result of calls to <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract(System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription)" />, <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint)" />, or <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint},System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName)" />.
trans-unit.target: 所生成的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> 对象的可枚举集合，表示生成为调用 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract(System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription)" />、<see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint)" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint},System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName)" /> 的结果的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A> property to get a collection of all the metadata generated as a result of any number of calls to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 对于为所有 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A>、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> 调用所生成的结果，使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A> 属性可获取这些结果的全部元数据的集合。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that you check the base <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> property to determine whether any errors occurred before you retrieve the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 建议您在检索元数据前，先检查基本 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> 属性，以确定是否有错误发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> method to generate a set of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects from the endpoints in a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects called `myServiceEndpoints`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> 方法，从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> 所调用的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> 对象集合中的终结点生成一组 `myServiceEndpoints` 对象。
